title: Shame Economy
description: Detects when shame, stigma, or manufactured moral panic are weaponized as economic drivers, resulting in erasure of identities, histories, or knowledge systems.
indicators: Content moderation or censorship justified via stigma rather than harm evidence
Advertising or profit models that rely on amplifying shame/fear
Systematic erasure of groups or narratives framed as 'undesirable' or 'unsafe'
Policy or legal language invoking morality/shame to justify restriction
